data.title: bd-as4h: integrate protocol commands into agent loop prompts
data.description: Adds all 5 protocol commands (resume, start, review, finish, cleanup) to worker-loop, dev-loop, and reviewer-loop prompts. Also adds botbox status to reviewer templates. Includes regression tests.

data.reason: Security review: LGTM. Changes are exclusively prompt template text and regression tests. No new executable code paths, input handling, command interpolation, or security-relevant logic. Template variables ({agent}, {project}) come from validated config, not user input. Protocol command references are hardcoded strings. Unsafe blocks are test-only env var setup (standard Rust 2024 pattern). No security concerns.
